short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI and blockchain-powered Advisor that builds confidence in the NFTs you buy by combining AI smarts with human intelligence.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI and blockchain-powered Advisor that builds confidence in the NFTs you buy by combining AI smarts with human intelligence.

Imagine if with one click you could discover fair pricing and enlist transparent, unbiased human appraisals for digital assets ranging from art and music NFTs  to sports collectibles to virtual real estate or tokenized carbon credits! VeryVerse’s platform enhances liquidity, prevents against fraud, and drives affiliate services for billions of dollars of transactions in rapidly growing marketplaces for digital assets.  

Using VeryVerse’s infrastructure, buyers and sellers can have assets appraised through a robust AI that yields low cost appraisals and, as necessary, enlist additional independent, transparent, blockchain-based vetting of quality, price, and value. Marketplaces embed VeryVerse APIs to appraise listed assets and provide such analytics and insights to clients and subscribers.
